sentence.Network_en: The balloonist cheated death in spite of the storm.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管风狂雨暴,乘气球升空者幸免于难.

sentence.Network_en: And the clothing worn by a Japanese balloonist in nineteen ninety - four .
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一个日本热气球驾驶者在1994年穿过的 飞行服.

sentence.Network_en: The balloonist received a rude welcome.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位气球驾驶员受到了非礼的接待.

list.abs: inventor and balloonist Frederick Eshoo drifts over Albuquerque , New Mexico , in his invention , Sunstat , the first maneuverable solar air balloon .发明家及热气球驾驶者弗雷德里克·埃索驾驶着他的发明--首架可操纵太阳能热气球在美国新墨西哥州的阿尔伯克基上空飘过。

inventor and balloonist Frederick Eshoo drifts over Albuquerque , New Mexico , in his invention , Sunstat , the first maneuverable solar-air balloon .发明家和气球驾驶者弗雷德里克。一休驾驶自己发明的热气球太阳斯达——第一个机动的日光热气球，飘过了新墨西哥的阿伯科克市。

entry.tran: 乘热气球飞行的人；热气球驾驶者
entry.def: A balloonist is a person who flies a hot-air balloon.

auth_sentence.content: Balloonist Ian Sharpe, from Caterham in Surrey, is behind the attempt and said he was "absolutely elated".

auth_sentence.content: The balloonist was forced to reroute his course to the south after Libya denied use of its airspace.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Jones, himself a round-the-world balloonist, said it would be a grand adventure and "real Boy's Own stuff".
